code: import React from"react";import Nav,{Li,Ul,Sidebar,Content}from"../navbar/Nav";import{useDispatch}from"react-redux";import{userActions}from"../../store/user-slice";import{CgProfile}from"react-icons/cg";import{ImExit}from"react-icons/im";import{MdOutlineAnnouncement}from"react-icons/md";import{FaMoneyBillWave}from"react-icons/fa";import{IoIosBook}from"react-icons/io";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function StudentNav(props){var dispatch=useDispatch();function logoutHandler(){dispatch(userActions.logout());}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Nav,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Sidebar,{header:"Menu",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Li,{to:"/student/profile",icon:CgProfile,children:"Profile"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Ul,{text:"Manage Classes",icon:IoIosBook,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Li,{to:"/student/registered",children:"Registered Next Year"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Li,{to:"/student/schedule",children:"Schedule"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Li,{to:"/student/add-classes",children:"Add Classes"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Li,{to:"/student/drop-classes",children:"Drop Classes"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Li,{to:"/student/history",children:"My History"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Li,{to:"/student/billing",icon:FaMoneyBillWave,children:"Billing"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Li,{to:"/student/announcement",icon:MdOutlineAnnouncement,children:"Announcement"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Li,{onClick:logoutHandler,to:"/login",icon:ImExit,children:"Logout"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Content,{children:props.children})]});}export default StudentNav;
